meanings.definition: A publication produced by fans of a particular cultural phenomenon, typically amateur and non-profit.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the fanzine about my favorite band.
meanings.sent2: The fanzine featured artwork and articles created by passionate fans.
meanings.sent3: The fanzine had a funny comic strip that made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a fanzine come to life, filled with posters and fan art.
meanings.sent5: The fanzine was a colorful collage of fan creativity.

meanings.definition: To create or contribute to a fanzine.
meanings.sent1: She decided to fanzine about her favorite TV show.
meanings.sent2: Fans from around the world fanzine together to share their love for the series.
meanings.sent3: I fanzine every month to showcase my artwork.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fanzining was like a beacon of creativity.
meanings.sent5: They fanzine with passion and enthusiasm.
